results.name: The second left hand column of triangle A167580.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8, -24, 32, -16).
xref: Equals the second left hand column of triangle A167580.
Other left hand columns are A014480 A167582, A168305 and A168306.
